name: NIIT
description: NIIT is a leading Global Talent Development Corporation that is building a manpower pool for global industry requirements. The company, which was set up in 1981 to help the nascent IT industry overcome its human resource challenges, today ranks among the world’s leading training companies owing to its vast, yet comprehensive array of talent development programs. With a footprint across 30 nations, NIIT offers training and development solutions to Individuals, Enterprises and Institutions.
business_objectives: Accelerate Skill Development and Learning Efficiency
Headline: Jumpstart your career with confidence
ShortDescription: NIIT pioneers in the learning industry

Highlights.name: Global Leader
Highlights.description: NIIT operates in 30+ countries, providing extensive talent development programs worldwide.

Highlights.name: Strategic Focus
Highlights.description: Reorganized in 2023, NIIT now emphasizes Skills & Careers, offering diverse programs through platforms like NIIT Digital and StackRoute.

Highlights.name: Recognized Excellence
Highlights.description: NIIT has won numerous awards, including Best E-Learning Platform 2022 by ASSOCHAM, and has been a top Training Outsourcing Company for 15 years.

enhanced_description: NIIT is a global leader in talent development, established in 1981 to address human resource challenges, initially in the IT industry. Today, it serves as a comprehensive training and development solution provider for Individuals, Enterprises, and Institutions, with a footprint across 40+ countries. The company has nurtured over 40 million learners worldwide and collaborates with 800+ hiring partners. Following a reorganization in 2023, NIIT strategically emphasizes Skills & Careers, delivering diverse programs through platforms like NIIT Digital and StackRoute. Recognized for excellence, NIIT has received numerous awards, including 'Best E-Learning Platform 2022' by ASSOCHAM, and has been a top Training Outsourcing Company for 15 years.
